DL CCE Allocation SR.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl16Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl1Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl2Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl4Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl8Num'].sum(), df['N.CCE.DL.AllocReq.Num'].sum(), multiplier=100)

DL Data Rate above 200Mbps.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index12'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index13'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index14'].sum(), df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index0'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index1'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index2'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index3'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index4'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index5'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index6'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index7'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index8'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index9'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index10'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index11'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index12'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index13'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index14'].sum(), multiplier=100)

DL Data Rate below 50Mbps.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index0'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index1'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index2'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index3'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index4'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index5'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index6'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index7'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index8'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index9'].sum(), df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index0'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index1'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index2'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index3'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index4'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index5'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index6'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index7'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index8'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index9'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index10'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index11'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index12'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index13'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index14'].sum(), multiplier=100)

DL Data Rate between 50 to 200.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index10'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index11'].sum(), df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index0'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index1'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index2'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index3'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index4'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index5'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index6'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index7'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index8'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index9'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index10'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index11'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index12'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index13'].sum() + df['N.Thp.DL.Samp.Index14'].sum(), multiplier=100)

DL IBLER (%).formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.ErrTB.Ibler'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.ErrTB.Ibler'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.ErrTB.Ibler'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.ErrTB.Ibler'].sum(), df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum(), multiplier=100)

DL RBLER (%).formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum(), df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum(), multiplier=100)

DL Retrans (%).formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum(), df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum(), multiplier=100)

Downlink DCI allocation success rate.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl1Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl2Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl4Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl8Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.DL.AggLvl16Num'].sum(), df['N.CCE.DL.AllocReq.Num'].sum(), multiplier=100)

EFIC.NR_RRC Setup(Service).formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.Emc'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.HighPri'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.Mt'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.MoData'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.MoVoiceCall'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.MpsPri'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.MoSms'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Succ.MoVideoCall'].sum(), df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.Emc'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.HighPri'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.Mt'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.MoData'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.MoVoiceCall'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.MpsPri'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.MoSms'].sum() + df['N.RRC.SetupReq.Att.MoVideoCall'].sum(), multiplier=100)

Rank1 Rate of DL TB.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.PDSCH.NbrTbDl.Rank1'].sum(), df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum(), multiplier=100)

Rank2 Rate of DL TB.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.PDSCH.NbrTbDl.Rank2'].sum(), df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum(), multiplier=100)

Rank4 Rate of DL TB.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.PDSCH.NbrTbDl.Rank4'].sum(), df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.QPSK.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.16QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.64QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.DL.SCH.256QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum(), multiplier=100)

TA Average.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index0'].sum()*0 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index1'].sum()*1 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index2'].sum()*2 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index3'].sum()*3 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index4'].sum()*4 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index5'].sum()*5 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index6'].sum()*6 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index7'].sum()*7 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index8'].sum()*8 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index9'].sum()*9 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index10'].sum()*10 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index11'].sum()*11 + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index12'].sum()*12, df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index0'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index1'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index2'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index3'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index4'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index5'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index6'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index7'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index8'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index9'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index10'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index11'].sum() + df['N.RA.TA.UE.Index12'].sum())

Taxa Dados DL BWP2 (Mbps).formula: (lambda vol_diff, time_diff: (vol_diff / time_diff) * 1000 if time_diff else np.nan)((df['N.ThpVol.DL(kbit)'].sum() - df['N.ThpVol.DL.LastSlot(kbit)'].sum()) - (df['N.BWP.ThpVol.DL(kbit)'].sum() - df['N.BWP.ThpVol.DL.LastSlot(kbit)'].sum()), df['N.ThpTime.DL.RmvLastSlot(microsecond)'].sum() - df['N.BWP.ThpTime.DL.RmvLastSlot(microsecond)'].sum())

UL Data Rate between 20 a 70.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index7'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index8'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index9'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index10'].sum(), df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index0'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index1'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index2'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index3'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index4'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index5'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index6'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index7'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index8'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index9'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index10'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index11'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index12'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index13'].sum() + df['N.Thp.UL.Samp.Index14'].sum(), multiplier=100)

UL IBLER (%).formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.UL.SCH.HalfPiBPSK.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.QPSK.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.16QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.64QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.256QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum(), df['N.UL.SCH.HalfPiBPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum(), multiplier=100)

UL RBLER (%).formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.UL.SCH.HalfPiBPSK.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.QPSK.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.16QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.64QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.256QAM.ErrTB.Rbler'].sum(), df['N.UL.SCH.HalfPiBPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum(), multiplier=100)

UL Retrans (%).formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.UL.SCH.QPSK.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.16QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.64QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.256QAM.TB.Retrans'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.HalfPiBPSK.TB.Retrans'].sum(), df['N.UL.SCH.QPSK.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.16QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.64QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.256QAM.TB'].sum() + df['N.UL.SCH.HalfPiBPSK.TB'].sum(), multiplier=100)

Uplink DCI allocation success rate.formula: SAFE_DIV(df['N.CCE.UL.AggLvl1Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.UL.AggLvl2Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.UL.AggLvl4Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.UL.AggLvl8Num'].sum() + df['N.CCE.UL.AggLvl16Num'].sum(), df['N.CCE.UL.AllocReq.Num'].sum(), multiplier=100)
